author: ben_a_adams
content:
EIP-7776: Prevent Block Gas Smuggling https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8918

Alternative to EIP-7623 "increase call data cost"; by instead ignoring calldata zero token discounts and sstore refunds when calculating block gas use (so included txs can't go "over" block gaslimit via reductions)

author: ben_a_adams
content: Is how Xen token miners kill throughput; the refunds allow you to include more activities in the block

author: ben_a_adams
content: Have 30M block; get 10M refunds, now can add 10M more; is now again a 30M block when actually its a 40M block of work for the Evm?

author: lightclient

author: ben_a_adams
content:
It does because it prices all calldata at 16 gas whether zero or non-zero for the block (rather than tx which has a 12 gas discount for zero)

So block is capped at the lower non-zero calldata side
